languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, срочное донесение из корабельного святилища! Группа неизвестных вторглась в храм Его и похитила нетленные мощи ваших предков, попутно изничтожая благочестивых прихожан. В числе пострадавших числится Высокий фактотум. Если бы господин Монтэг и госпожа Зауэрбэк не подоспели вовремя... К счастью, господин Данрок выжил и пребывает в сознании, хоть и страдает. Он умоляет Вашу Светлость прибыть в храм и принять его исповедь".

"Lord Captain, an urgent report from the vessel's shrine: a group of unknown assailants has invaded His temple and plundered the incorruptible relics of your ancestors, slaughtering devout worshippers as they went. The High Factotum is among the casualties. Had Master Monteg and Mistress Sauerback not arrived in time... Fortunately, Master Danrok survived and remains conscious, albeit in great pain. He implores Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to come to the temple and hear his confession."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, срочное донесение из корабельного святилища! Группа неизвестных вторглась в храм Его и похитила нетленные мощи ваших предков, попутно изничтожая благочестивых прихожан. В числе пострадавших числится Высокий фактотум. Если бы господин Монтэг и госпожа Зауэрбэк не подоспели вовремя... К счастью, господин Данрок выжил и пребывает в сознании, хоть и страдает. Он умоляет Вашу Светлость прибыть в храм и принять его исповедь".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ein dringender Bericht aus dem Schrein des Schiffes: Eine Gruppe unbekannter Angreifer ist in Seinen Tempel eingedrungen, hat die unzerstörbaren Relikte Eurer Vorfahren geplündert und dabei ergebene Anbeter hingemetzelt. Das Hoch-Faktotum ist eines der Opfer. Wären Herr Monteg und Herrin Sauerback nicht rechtzeitig eingetroffen ... Zum Glück hat Meister Danrok überlebt und ist bei Bewusstsein, leidet allerdings große Schmerzen. Er fleht Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} an, in den Tempel zu kommen und ihm die Beichte abzunehmen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, an urgent report from the vessel's shrine: a group of unknown assailants has invaded His temple and plundered the incorruptible relics of your ancestors, slaughtering devout worshippers as they went. The High Factotum is among the casualties. Had Master Monteg and Mistress Sauerback not arrived in time... Fortunately, Master Danrok survived and remains conscious, albeit in great pain. He implores Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to come to the temple and hear his confession."

Er fleht Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} an, in den Tempel zu kommen und ihm die Beichte abzunehmen."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hemos recibido un informe urgente del templo de la nave: un grupo de asaltantes desconocidos ha invadido Su templo y saqueado las incorruptibles reliquias de sus antepasados, masacrando a numerosos devotos en el proceso. El Sumo Factótum se cuenta entre las bajas. Si el maestro Monteg y la maestra Sauerback no hubiesen llegado a tiempo... Por suerte, el maestro Danrok ha sobrevivido y está consciente, aunque presa de grandes dolores. Implora a su merced que acuda al templo para oírle en confesión».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, an urgent report from the vessel's shrine: a group of unknown assailants has invaded His temple and plundered the incorruptible relics of your ancestors, slaughtering devout worshippers as they went. The High Factotum is among the casualties. Had Master Monteg and Mistress Sauerback not arrived in time... Fortunately, Master Danrok survived and remains conscious, albeit in great pain. He implores Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to come to the temple and hear his confession."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hemos recibido un informe urgente del templo de la nave: un grupo de asaltantes desconocidos ha invadido Su templo y saqueado las incorruptibles reliquias de sus antepasados, masacrando a numerosos devotos en el proceso. El Sumo Factótum se cuenta entre las bajas. Si el maestro Monteg y la maestra Sauerback no hubiesen llegado a tiempo... Por suerte, el maestro Danrok ha sobrevivido y está consciente, aunque presa de grandes dolores. Implora a su merced que acuda al templo para oírle en confesión».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、神殿より緊急報告です。正体不明の襲撃者たちが神殿に侵入し、先祖代々の高潔な遺物を略奪し、信心深い参拝者を虐殺しました。犠牲者の中にはハイ・ファクトタムもいます。モンテグ氏とザウアーバック氏が駆けつけなかったらどうなっていたか…幸いにもダンロック氏は一命を取り留めて、ひどい痛みに苦しみながらも意識を保っておられます。彼は陛下が神殿を訪れて、彼の告白を聞いて欲しいと懇願しています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, an urgent report from the vessel's shrine: a group of unknown assailants has invaded His temple and plundered the incorruptible relics of your ancestors, slaughtering devout worshippers as they went. The High Factotum is among the casualties. Had Master Monteg and Mistress Sauerback not arrived in time... Fortunately, Master Danrok survived and remains conscious, albeit in great pain. He implores Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to come to the temple and hear his confession."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、神殿より緊急報告です。正体不明の襲撃者たちが神殿に侵入し、先祖代々の高潔な遺物を略奪し、信心深い参拝者を虐殺しました。犠牲者の中にはハイ・ファクトタムもいます。モンテグ氏とザウアーバック氏が駆けつけなかったらどうなっていたか…幸いにもダンロック氏は一命を取り留めて、ひどい痛みに苦しみながらも意識を保っておられます。彼は陛下が神殿を訪れて、彼の告白を聞いて欲しいと懇願しています」

languages.text: “舰长大人，船上的礼拜堂传来了紧急报告：一群身份不明的袭击者闯入了帝皇的圣殿，夺走了您的祖先传下的不朽圣物，还沿途大肆屠戮虔诚的信徒。高阶顾问也不幸受害，若不是蒙特格大师与苏尔贝克女士及时赶到的话……幸运的是，丹罗克大师活了下来。尽管他受了重伤，但意识依然保持清醒。他恳求大人您前往礼拜堂，聆听他的忏悔。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, an urgent report from the vessel's shrine: a group of unknown assailants has invaded His temple and plundered the incorruptible relics of your ancestors, slaughtering devout worshippers as they went. The High Factotum is among the casualties. Had Master Monteg and Mistress Sauerback not arrived in time... Fortunately, Master Danrok survived and remains conscious, albeit in great pain. He implores Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to come to the temple and hear his confession."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，船上的礼拜堂传来了紧急报告：一群身份不明的袭击者闯入了帝皇的圣殿，夺走了您的祖先传下的不朽圣物，还沿途大肆屠戮虔诚的信徒。高阶顾问也不幸受害，若不是蒙特格大师与苏尔贝克女士及时赶到的话……幸运的是，丹罗克大师活了下来。尽管他受了重伤，但意识依然保持清醒。他恳求大人您前往礼拜堂，聆听他的忏悔。”

languages.text: « Rapport urgent en provenance du sanctuaire du vaisseau, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : un groupe d'assaillants non identifiés a envahi le temple et pillé les reliques sacrées de vos ancêtres, massacrant au passage de fidèles croyants. Le haut factotum fait partie des victimes, et si maître Monteg et maîtresse Sauerback n'étaient pas intervenus à temps... Par chance, maître Danrok a survécu et il reste conscient, même s'il souffre terriblement. Il implore Votre Seigneurie de bien vouloir le rejoindre au temple pour l'entendre en confession. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, an urgent report from the vessel's shrine: a group of unknown assailants has invaded His temple and plundered the incorruptible relics of your ancestors, slaughtering devout worshippers as they went. The High Factotum is among the casualties. Had Master Monteg and Mistress Sauerback not arrived in time... Fortunately, Master Danrok survived and remains conscious, albeit in great pain. He implores Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to come to the temple and hear his confession."

traits.locale_text: « Rapport urgent en provenance du sanctuaire du vaisseau, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : un groupe d'assaillants non identifiés a envahi le temple et pillé les reliques sacrées de vos ancêtres, massacrant au passage de fidèles croyants. Le haut factotum fait partie des victimes, et si maître Monteg et maîtresse Sauerback n'étaient pas intervenus à temps... Par chance, maître Danrok a survécu et il reste conscient, même s'il souffre terriblement. Il implore Votre Seigneurie de bien vouloir le rejoindre au temple pour l'entendre en confession. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, geminin şapelinden acil bir rapor ulaştı. Bilinmeyen bir grup saldırgan, O'nun tapınağını istila ederek atalarınıza ait yozlaşmaz yadigârları yağmalamış ve yollarına çıkan tüm dindar müritleri katletmiş. Zayiat arasında Arşıkâhya da bulunuyor. Üstat Monteg ile Sauerback Hanım zamanında gelmeselermiş... Neyse ki Üstat Danrok, son derece acı içinde olmasına rağmen hayatta ve kendisinin bilinci yerinde. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne tapınağa gelerek günah çıkarmasını dinlemesi için yalvarıyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, an urgent report from the vessel's shrine: a group of unknown assailants has invaded His temple and plundered the incorruptible relics of your ancestors, slaughtering devout worshippers as they went. The High Factotum is among the casualties. Had Master Monteg and Mistress Sauerback not arrived in time... Fortunately, Master Danrok survived and remains conscious, albeit in great pain. He implores Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to come to the temple and hear his confession."
